methods.name: addChangeListener
methods.comment:
Add format change listener.
 Listeners will only be notified if autoUpdate was true when instantiated.

methods.name: followReferencedPointers
methods.comment: Get current state of the Follow Referenced Pointers option.

return.comment:
true if operand pointer read of indirect references will be followed and 
 non-dynamic pointer referenced symbol will be rendered in place of pointer label.
